features.name: Long Throw Cold Air Circulator (LTCC)
features.description: Cools even a large room effortlessly with an aerodynamic 360  blower and powerful fan motor

features.name: R32 Refrigerant
features.description: R32 is an environmentally friendly, highly efficient refrigerant as compared to R410A, a commonly found refrigerant in residential Air Conditioners.

features.name: Dual Goldfin
features.description: The fins on both the indoor and outdoor units are coated to improve heat exchange for better cooling.

features.name: 4 Way Auto Cooling*
features.description: Motorised vanes automatically swing horizontally and vertically, in all four directions, to deliver cool air evenly across the room.

features.name: Air Cooled PCB
features.description: A unique cooling system in the ODU keeps the PCB cool. This enables the AC to perform consistently and efficiently and increases the PCB’s durability.

features.name: Ergonomic Remote
features.description: The best in class, matte black AC remote is minimally designed and easy to use.

features.name: 100% Copper Piping with Inner grooved tubes
features.description: The tubes for condensers, evaporator and interconnecting pipes use 100% copper which increases machine longevity and provides up to 30% faster cooling.

features.name: Nanotek coating on Evaporator Tubes
features.description: A special Nanotek coating protects the exposed evaporator tubes from corrosion. This prevents leakages, inefficient cooling and breakdowns.

features.name: Automotive Grade coating on ODU
features.description: The ODU is painted with a high temperature silver powder coating to protect it from rain, dust, ultraviolet sunlight and pollutants.

features.name: Energy Savings
features.description: All IFB Air Conditioners are ISEER compliant, guaranteeing higher machine performance at lower energy consumption.

features.name: Sturdy ODU Stand With Stainless steel bolts
features.description: The ODU stand is specially designed to ensure resistance against corrosion.

features.name: My IFB App

features.name: 7 Stage Air Treatment*

features.name: 8 IN 1
features.description: Allows you the choice to operate the AC at 8 different capacities based on your cooling requirements. Enables faster cooling and saves power.

features.description: The WiFi feature allows you to operate your AC remotely, at your convenience.

features.description: Just tilt the machine backwards and roll it to move it around. Two wheels at the back of the machine enable quick mobility.

features.name: 9 Swirl Wash
features.description: Powerful and efficient Eco Inverter motor along with AI and 9 Swirl mimics handwashing to deliver a perfect wash.

features.name: Crescent Moon Drum
features.description: Smooth crescent moon grooves on the drum surface create a gentle water cushion that prevents damage to fabrics.

features.name: Self Diagnosis
features.description: Displays error codes on the machine, enabling you to troubleshoot the problem. In case error persists, contact IFB Care.

features.name: Eco Inverter Motor
features.description: Silent and energy efficient performance  50% water savings, 40% power savings.

features.name: Aqua Energie
features.description: IFB's patented Aqua Energie treats hard water and improves detergent action to protect color and prevent fading.

features.name: Warm Soak
features.description: Soaking clothes in warm water helps to loosen stubborn dirt and fight tough stains. Ideal for heavily soiled clothes.

features.name: POWER STEAM®
features.description: Dual steam cycle generates steam twice during the wash program. At the start to kill 99.99% germs and at the end to reduce wrinkles and keep clothes soft.

features.name: Steam Refresh
features.description: Fresh clothes, free of odour and wrinkles in just 30 minutes. Steam only cycle  no water, no detergent.

features.name: Cradle Wash®
features.description: Washes clothes with a gentle swaying motion. Ideal for silks, lace, satins, chiffons etc.

features.name: Xpert Wash
features.description: Let the Xpert on the My IFB app do the laundry. It intuitively suggests the wash program based on the type of fabric and soilage level selected.

features.name: Time Saver
features.description: Cuts down the wash time by up to 45% while keeping the rinse and the spin steps the same.

features.name: Wifi & Voice Enabled
features.description: Whether you are at work or on the go, with the MYIFB App you can control and monitor your washing machine from anywhere, anytime

features.name: Laundry Add Option
features.description: Allows you to pause the wash mid-cycle and add forgotten laundry before resuming the wash cycle.

features.name: Auto Tub Clean
features.description: Intuitively reminds you to run the tub clean program after every 40 cycles, ensuring timely cleaning.

features.name: Tri-shield Protection
features.description: Built to last, our washers are protected by a 4 year comprehensive warranty, a 10 year motor warranty and 10 years of spares support.

features.name: One Touch Essentials Ordering
features.description: Just click the essentials button on your washing machine and IFB CARE will contact you for your order.

features.name: Exchange Program
features.description: #SwitchToSavings with great upgrade offers and loyalty benefits.  IFB e-waste management team will dispose of your old machine responsibly.

features.name: Powered By AI
features.description: Intuitive AI detects fabric type & weight. It then optimises the water lever, time & wash motion to preserve the texture, color & shape of your clothes.

features.name: Eco Inverter Motor
features.description: Silent and energy efficient performance  50% water savings, 40% power savings.

features.name: Oxyjet™ Technology
features.description: Premixes detergent with water and jet sprays it on the clothes. Millions of O2 bubbles are generated in the drum. These actions lift stubborn dirt, remove stains, save 25% water, 40% energy, 50% detergent.

features.name: Aqua Energie
features.description: IFB's patented Aqua Energie treats hard water and improves detergent action to protect color and prevent fading.

features.name: Warm Soak
features.description: Soaking clothes in warm water helps to loosen stubborn dirt and fight tough stains. Ideal for heavily soiled clothes.

features.name: POWER STEAM®
features.description: Dual steam cycle generates steam twice during the wash program. At the start to kill 99.99% germs and at the end to reduce wrinkles and keep clothes soft.

features.name: Steam Refresh
features.description: Fresh clothes, free of odour and wrinkles in just 30 minutes. Steam only cycle  no water, no detergent.

features.name: Cradle Wash®
features.description: Washes clothes with a gentle swaying motion. Ideal for silks, lace, satins, chiffons etc.

features.name: Xpert Wash
features.description: Let the Xpert on the My IFB app do the laundry. It intuitively suggests the wash program based on the type of fabric and soilage level selected.

features.name: Time Saver
features.description: Cuts down the wash time by up to 45% while keeping the rinse and the spin steps the same.

features.name: Wifi & Voice Enabled
features.description: Whether you are at work or on the go, with the MYIFB App you can control and monitor your washing machine from anywhere, anytime

features.name: Laundry Add Option
features.description: Allows you to pause the wash mid-cycle and add forgotten laundry before resuming the wash cycle.

features.name: Auto Tub Clean
features.description: Intuitively reminds you to run the tub clean program after every 40 cycles, ensuring timely cleaning.

features.description: Just click the essentials button on your washing machine and IFB CARE will contact you for your order.

features.name: Protects From Outdoor Pollution
features.description: Protects clothes from exposure to outdoor dust, germs and contaminants.

features.name: Protects From Indoor Pollution
features.description: Protects your home from germs, allergens, mould and odours caused by drying clothes indoors.

features.name: Dry Clothes In Just 60 Minutes
features.description: Anytime drying for convenient laundry management.

features.name: All Weather Drying
features.description: Rain or shine, we promise you 100% dry clothes, even on the wettest day of the year.

features.name: Solution For No Drying Space
features.description: Requires very little space in your bathroom or laundry area.

features.name: Refresh Cycle
features.description: Clothes stored for a long time need to be aired. The Refresh Cycle passes cool air over them and makes them smell fresh.

features.name: Anticrease
features.description: Gentle rotation with auto reverse drying uses hot and cool air to reduce creasing. Just wash, dry and wear.

features.name: No Fading
features.description: UV rays from the sun fade fabrics over time. IFB 100% Clothes Dryer keeps your clothes looking as good as new.

features.name: Flexible Venting Options
features.description: Adjustable duct position, from the side to the top of the machine, using the vent kit provided.

features.name: Overheat Protection
features.description: Ensures safe drying of clothes by maintaining the temperature within a certain limit.

features.name: Warranty
features.description: IFB Clothes Dryer are built to last with a 4 years super warranty.

features.description: Specially formulated dryer bag for your clothes dryer.
